A fully functional E-commerce Website

Sub heading

Features :

  • A ReactJS application that features a fully functional clothing store website
  • Implement's user authentication and signin/signout session tracking using Google Firebase's authentication.
  • Firestore Database storage to store relevant data
  • React router to handle route change and render appropriate components
  • Used React context for managing and preserving state of data across the application
  • Payment system implemented using stripe.
Preview Github

A face detection Application

Sub heading

Features :

  • This is a Fullstack ReactJS application Comprising a login page, registration and Home page.
  • Implements face-detection API from Clarifai.
  • Firestore Database storage to store relevant data
  • Draws boxes around detected faces
  • Detects multiple faces.
  • Backend implemented with NodeJS and REST API to handle correct endpoint requests.
  • PostgreSQL Database for storing user information.
